    Í∞ÄÏÉÅÌôòÍ≤Ω Î∞è scrapy ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Íµ¨Ï∂ï

    # Í∞ÄÏÉÅÌôòÍ≤Ω Íµ¨Ï∂ï
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate

# python library ÏÑ§Ïπò
pip3 install scrapy
pip3 install ipykernel
pip3 install pymongo
pip3 install requests

# jupyter notebook kernel Íµ¨Ï∂ï
python3 -m ipykernel install --user --name venv --display-name "venv_scrapy"

# scrapy project ÏãúÏûë
scrapy startproject kidnewscrawling

    ÏÇ¨Ï†Ñ ÌôïÏù∏

    • interested_url/robots.txt Î•º ÌÜµÌï¥ crawling Í∞ÄÎä• Ïó¨Î∂Ä ÌôïÏù∏

        • Disallow: /sv*
        • Disallow: /list*
        • Disallow: /cartoonlist*
        • Disallow: /priv*

    Requests

    • Requests ÎùºÏù¥Î∏åÎü¨Î¶¨Î•º ÌôúÏö©ÌïòÏó¨ xpath/css Ï∞æÍ∏∞
    import scrapy
import requests
import re
request_object = requests.get('http://kid.chosun.com/site/data/html_dir/2022/01/31/2022013100293.html')

if 'charset' not in request_object.headers['content-type']:
    request_object.encoding = request_object.apparent_encoding

response_object = scrapy.Selector(request_object)

p = " ".join(response_object.xpath('//div[@class="Paragraph"]//div[not(contains(@class, "center_img"))]//text()').extract())
re.sub(r'[<ÏÇ¨ÏßÑ>\xa0]', '', p).strip()

    'Ìò∏Ï£º Ï†ïÎ∂ÄÍ∞Ä ÏΩîÏïåÎùº ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥ÑÎ•º Î≥¥Ï†ÑÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ 400Ïñµ ÏõêÏù¥ ÎÑòÎäî ÎèàÏùÑ ÏèüÏïÑÎ∂ìÍ∏∞Î°ú ÌñàÎã§. 29Ïùº(ÌòÑÏßÄ ÏãúÍ∞Å) CNNÏóê Îî∞Î•¥Î©¥ Ìò∏Ï£º Ï†ïÎ∂ÄÎäî ÏΩîÏïåÎùº Í∞úÏ≤¥ Ïàò(Êï∏)Î•º Î≥¥Ìò∏ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏïûÏúºÎ°ú 4ÎÖÑÍ∞Ñ 5000Îßå Ìò∏Ï£ºÎã¨Îü¨(ÏïΩ 422Ïñµ Ïõê)Î•º Ìà¨ÏûêÌïúÎã§. Ïä§ÏΩß Î™®Î¶¨Ïä® Ìò∏Ï£º Ï¥ùÎ¶¨Îäî ‚ÄúÏΩîÏïåÎùºÎäî ÏÑ∏Í≥ÑÏóêÏÑú ÎûëÎ∞õÎäî Ìò∏Ï£ºÏùò ÏÉÅÏßï‚ÄùÏù¥ÎùºÎ©∞ ‚ÄúÎã§Ïùå ÏÑ∏ÎåÄÎ•º ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏµúÏÑ†ÏùÑ Îã§Ìï¥ ÏΩîÏïåÎùºÎ•º Î≥¥Ìò∏Ìï¥Ïïº ÌïúÎã§‚ÄùÍ≥† Î∞ùÌòîÎã§. Ï†ïÎ∂Ä ÏòàÏÇ∞ÏùÄ ÏΩîÏïåÎùº ÏÑúÏãùÏßÄ Î≥µÏõêÍ≥º ÏπòÎ£å, Ïó∞Íµ¨ Îì±Ïóê Ïö©ÎêúÎã§. ÏßÄÎÇúÌï¥ 9Ïõî Ìò∏Ï£º ÏΩîÏïåÎùº Ïû¨Îã®Ïù¥ Î∞úÌëúÌïú ÎÇ¥Ïö©Ïóê Îî∞Î•¥Î©¥ 2018ÎÖÑ Ïù¥ÌõÑ ÏÇ∞Î∂à, Í∞ÄÎ≠Ñ, ÌÜ†ÏßÄ Í∞úÍ∞Ñ(ÈñãÂ¢æ) Îì±ÏúºÎ°ú Ìò∏Ï£ºÏóê ÏÑúÏãùÌïòÎäî ÏΩîÏïåÎùºÏùò ÏïΩ 30ÔºÖÍ∞Ä ÎùºÏ°åÎã§. ÌäπÌûà 2019ÎÖÑ Îâ¥Ïö∞Ïä§Ïõ®ÏùºÏ¶àÏùò ÎïÖ 4Îßå8000„é¢ÏùÑ ÌååÍ¥¥Ìïú ÎåÄÌòï ÏÇ∞Î∂àÏùÄ ÏΩîÏïåÎùº Í∞úÏ≤¥ Í∞êÏÜåÏóê ÏπòÎ™ÖÏ†ÅÏù¥ÏóàÎã§. ÌòÑÏû¨ ÏΩîÏïåÎùºÎäî ÏÑ∏Í≥Ñ ÏµúÎåÄ ÌôòÍ≤ΩÎ≥¥Ìò∏ Í∏∞Íµ¨Ïù∏ ‚ÄòÏÑ∏Í≥ÑÏûêÏó∞Î≥¥Ï†ÑÏó∞Îßπ(IUCN)‚ÄôÏù¥ Ï†ïÌïòÎäî ‚ÄòÏ∑®ÏïΩÏ¢Ö(Á®Æ)‚Äô Î™©Î°ùÏóê Ïò¨ÎùºÏûàÎã§. *ÏΩîÏïåÎùºÎ•º Î≥¥Ìò∏ÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ Ï†ïÎ¶¨Ìï¥ ÏïåÎ†§Ï£ºÏÑ∏Ïöî.'

    Requests ÌïúÍ∏Ä Íπ®Ïßê

    • request.headers['content-type'] - text/htmlÏù∏ Í≤ΩÏö∞ Ïù∏ÏΩîÎî© Î¨∏Ï†ú Î∞úÏÉù
    • Ìï¥Í≤∞
      • Î∞©Î≤ï1 - request.encodingÏùÑ ÏßÅÏ†ëÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏàòÏ†ï
      • Î∞©Î≤ï2 - request.encodingÏùÑ request.apparaent_encodingÏúºÎ°ú Î≥ÄÌôò
    request = requests.get('http://kid.chosun.com/list_kj.html?catid=1')

print(request.headers['content-type']) 
print(request.apparent_encoding)
print(request.encoding)

request = requests.get('http://kid.chosun.com/list_kj.html?catid=1')
# Î∞©Î≤ï 1
# request.encoding = 'euc-kr'

# Î∞©Î≤ï 2
if 'charset' not in request.headers['content-type']:
    request.encoding = request.apparent_encoding

request = scrapy.Selector(request)

    text/html
CP949

    Code

    items.py

    # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import scrapy


class KidNewScrawlingItem(scrapy.Item):
    # define the fields for your item here like:
    url = scrapy.Field() # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ ÏõêÎ¨∏ URL
    title = scrapy.Field() # Ï†úÎ™©
    subtitle = scrapy.Field() # Î∂ÄÏ†úÎ™©
    author = scrapy.Field() # Í∏∞Ïûê
    date = scrapy.Field() # ÎÇ†Ïßú   
    article = scrapy.Field() # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ ÎÇ¥Ïö©
    img_path = scrapy.Field() # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ img Í≤ΩÎ°ú
    source = scrapy.Field() # Ïã†Î¨∏ÏÇ¨
#     category = scrapy.Field() # Ïπ¥ÌÖåÍ≥†Î¶¨
    pass

    spiders/kidnews_spider.py

    # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import scrapy
from kidnewscrawling.items import KidNewScrawlingItem
import re

class KidNewsSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = "kidNewsCrawler"
    
    def start_requests(self):
        for page in range(1,3):
            url = 'http://kid.chosun.com/list_kj.html?catid=1&pn={page}'.format(page=page)
            yield scrapy.Request(url=url, callback=self.parse_url)
        
    def parse_url(self, response):
        # Ïù∏ÏΩîÎî© Î≥ÄÌôò
        if response.encoding == 'cp1252':
            response = response.replace(encoding='euc-kr')
        
        default_url = 'http://kid.chosun.com'
        urls = list(map(lambda x: default_url + x, response.xpath('//div[@class="subject"]/a/@href').extract()))
        
        for url in urls:
            yield response.follow(url=url, callback = self.parse_article)
            
    def parse_article(self, response):
        item = KidNewScrawlingItem()
        
        # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ url
        item["url"] = response.url
        
        # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ Ï†úÎ™©
        item["title"] = response.xpath('//title/text()').extract_first()

        # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ Î∂ÄÏ†úÎ™©, ÏóÜÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞ÎèÑ Ï°¥Ïû¨
        item["subtitle"] = response.xpath('//h3/text()').extract_first()

        # Í∏∞Ïûê, Í∏∞ÏûêÍ∞Ä ÏïÑÎãå Í≤ΩÏö∞ÎèÑ Ï°¥Ïû¨
        author = response.xpath('//span[@class="author"]/text()').extract_first()
        item["author"] = re.sub(r'[\r\n\tÏ†ïÎ¶¨=]', '', author).strip()

        # ÏûÖÎ†•ÎÇ†Ïßú
        date = response.xpath('//span[@class="date"]/text()').extract_first()
        item["date"] = re.sub(r'[\r\n\t]', '', date).strip()[5:21]
        
        # Î≥∏Î¨∏
        p = " ".join(response.xpath('//div[@class="Paragraph"]\
                                                [not(contains(@class, "center_img")) \
                                                and not(contains(@class, "right_img"))]//text()').extract())
        item["article"] = re.sub(r'[\r\n\t<ÏÇ¨ÏßÑ>\xa0]', '', p).strip()

        # Í∏∞ÏÇ¨ Ï≤´ ÏÇ¨ÏßÑ Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄ url
        item["img_path"] = response.xpath('//img[@id="artImg0"]/@src').extract_first()
        
        # Ïã†Î¨∏ÏßÄ
        item["source"] = "Ïñ¥Î¶∞Ïù¥Ï°∞ÏÑ†ÏùºÎ≥¥"

        yield item

    settings.py

    BOT_NAME = 'kidnewscrawling'

SPIDER_MODULES = ['kidnewscrawling.spiders']
NEWSPIDER_MODULE = 'kidnewscrawling.spiders'

# ÌïúÍ∏ÄÍπ®Ïßê
FEED_EXPORT_ENCODING = 'utf-8'

...

# Obey robots.txt rules
ROBOTSTXT_OBEY = False

# mongodb setting
LOG_LEVEL='ERROR'

ITEM_PIPELINES = {'kidnewscrawling.pipelines.MongoPipeline': 300,}

MONGO_URI = 'mongodb://root:1234@localhost:27017'
MONGO_DATABASE = 'newsDB'

    pipelines.py

    # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import pymongo
from itemadapter import ItemAdapter

class MongoPipeline:

    collection_name = 'news'

    def __init__(self, mongo_uri, mongo_db):
        self.mongo_uri = mongo_uri
        self.mongo_db = mongo_db

    @classmethod
    def from_crawler(cls, crawler):
        return cls(
            mongo_uri=crawler.settings.get('MONGO_URI'),
            mongo_db=crawler.settings.get('MONGO_DATABASE', 'items')
        )

    def open_spider(self, spider):
        self.client = pymongo.MongoClient(self.mongo_uri)
        self.db = self.client[self.mongo_db]

    def close_spider(self, spider):
        self.client.close()

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        print(item["title"])
        self.db[self.collection_name].insert_one(ItemAdapter(item).asdict())
        return item

    scrapy Ïã§Ìñâ

    • spiders/kidnews_spider.pyÏùò ÌÅ¥ÎûòÏä§ ÎÇ¥ Ïù¥Î¶Ñ
    scrapy crawl kidNewsCrawler
